page.title: 07Kennedy Way (continued)
page.content: We asked 50 people what improvements could be made to the shopping centre and these are the main replies we received: it could be cleaner, seating could be installed and one man even suggested having a large roof put over it. More than half of the people we interviewed attended functions at the Civic Centre which is used as a theatre, exhibition hall and, on occassions, a disco. The shops in the Precinct are used as much as,if not more than,the shops in Grimsby.The average number of visits to the Precinct is 4 times per person in a week. (Written and researched by Emma Raines, Sarah Somerscales, Billie-Jo Cuthbert, Rachel Forward, Nicola Steele, Sherri Ballard,Steven Foster-Isaacs.)
